lines.setup: Geordi rolls out of bed. His head pounds, his stomach is queasy and his whole body feels like dry mouth. 'Hundreds of years ago humans had a trick to fix these ailments,'Geordi thinks, 'now what was it?' He remembers. 'Hair of the dog'.
lines.replicator_command: Slusho, please. And not with synthehol either. The real stuff
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_succes: Finally, a real Slusho. Just what I need.
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: I might be ill, but I can tell there's nothing there.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: This is awful. How can you call this a Slusho?
